creator: Multiple Designers
trademark: Stalinist is a trademark of Alexey Maslov and Jovanny Lemonad.
license_desciption: This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
description: Imagine a post-apocalyptic world in the future. Imagine hiding in the underground: people, dirty air and despair. To transfer information, they still use fonts. But they have become simple, with a utilitarian and strong spirit. Stalinist is typeface for a post-apocalyptic time. Stalinist is a font made in Moscow at the end of the 21st century. That's the way it is. Stalinist One was designed collaboratively between Alexey Maslov and Jovanny Lemonad.
